name: TROGDOR! Real-mastered
description:
I have always been a fan of the Homestar Runner universe, and this game is one of the most famous ones that was made for it. This project was borne out of a desire to see what TROGDOR! might be like if it had actually been an arcade game in the mid-80's. The flash version has imprecise pixel alignment (a common occurrence in pixel-art flash games), and I am not much of a fan of that.

This is still very unfinished. The in-game arcade background is particularly egregious. When I have time I would like to improve the main menu design, the in-game sprites and sounds, and the enemy behavior, as well as add all the interstitials and levels of the original game.
